app_description.message: A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.

options_master_password_comment.message: Enter a master password to protect your preferences

options_resolve.message: Resolve the title of blocked pages (uncheck this option to prevent blocked servers from receiving any request)

options_startup.message: Perform blocking on existing pages after initialization

options_startup_current.message: Block the current matched page when a new rule is added

options_allow_access.message: Allow access to the unblocked hostname for (in seconds)

options_block_period.message: Block password check when wrong password is entered multiple times (in minutes)

options_reverse.message: Operate on reverse mode (only matching patterns are accessible)

options_sup_1.message: Optionally redirect blocked requests to this HTTP(S) URL

options_sup_2.message: This is a custom message that is shown on blocked page. Could be an instruction to open this blocked page or the administrative contact

options_sup_3.message: Inject custom CSS rules into the blocked interface. You can use this section to hide different elements or change the font properties of these elements

options_sup_6.message: To block hostnames containing a word use '*://*word*/*' rule. To block the same word inside the pathname part use '*://*/*word*' rule. If you just need to close a page with a rule, use the 'close' keyword in the 'Redirect To' box. To construct a regular expression rule, prepend the rule with 'R:' keyword. For instance, 'R:ht{2}ps*://.*\.go{2}gle\.com' blocks www.google.com on both HTTP and HTTPS protocols.

options_sup_8.message: Prepare a text file containing all the blocking rules in plain text format. After importing, press the save button for the changes to take place. To disregard the imported rules, reload this page without saving.

options_sup_10.message: When importing settings, all your existing settings will be overwritten. To export minified version, use Shift key while pressing the Export button

options_sup_11.message: By providing a regular expression rule, you can limit the current schedule to the matching URLs. To have multiple schedules with different rules, fill the section for each rule and press the save button. To delete a saved rule, fill the rule part and wait for the extension to load the schedule, then delete the timing section without removing the rule itself.

options_sup_12.message: a regular expression to limit the exposure of the current schedule

options_contextmenu_pause.message: Show pause context menu option on browser action's context

options_contextmenu_resume.message: Show resume context menu option on browser action's context

options_contextmenu_top.message: Show "(Un)Block this Page" context menu option on page context

options_contextmenu_frame.message: Show "(Un)Block this Frame" context menu option on frame context

options_no_pass_on_add.message: Do not ask for the master password to block a new hostname

options_disable_actions_options.message: Block context menu on this page

options_disable_actions_page.message: Block context menu and paste on blocked pages

options_contexts_both.message: Blocking applies to both Pages and Frames

options_theme.message: Select visual mode for the blocked page

options_intro.message: To save options or set a master password, scroll down. If you're new, block new websites by visiting the page and clicking the action button (it's in the extensions menu after installation). No need to manually make new rules.

options_sch_helper_1.message: Generate unblocking periods for the following blocked hours

options_incognito.message: Options page is not available on the incognito context

options_remove_all_confirm.message:
Are you sure you want to remove all existing blocking rules?

You can refresh the page without saving to restore the rules.

blocked_master_password.message: Enter the master password, then press enter to unblock for a minute

blocked_paste.message: Paste is not accepted. Type the password instead.

blocked_context.message: Access to context menu is forbidden.

blocked_drop.message: Drop is not accepted. Type the password instead.

bg_msg_1.message: This tab doesn't have a valid URL

bg_msg_3.message: Go to the options page and set a master password

bg_msg_4.message: Too many wrong passwords. Please wait for ## minute(s) and retry.

bg_msg_12.message: Please enter the master password to pause blocking

bg_msg_13.message: Unblock access to "##". Are you sure?

bg_msg_14.message: Access to "##" will be restricted with the following rules. Are you sure?

bg_msg_17.message: Please enter the master password to continue

bg_msg_21.message: It is most likely not possible to block the Extension Gallery. You can try anyway!

bg_msg_29.message: This operation cannot be performed in incognito mode. Please open the page in a regular browsing window and try again.
